publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2284 Mr Tom McCabe:Smoking, Health and Social Care (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Smoking, Health and Social Care (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any expenditure or increase in expenditure of a kind referred to in Rule 9.12.3(b)(ii) or (iii) of the Parliament’s Standing Orders arising in consequence of the Act. Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr*, Tavish Scott*, Rhona Brankin*

S2M-2284 Mr Tom McCabe: Smoking, Health and Social Care (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Smoking, Health and Social Care (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any expenditure or increase in expenditure of a kind referred to in Rule 9.12.3(b)(ii) or (iii) of the Parliament’s Standing Orders arising in consequence of the Act. Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr, Tavish Scott, Rhona Brankin
